content:
cilium-dbg troubleshoot 
 Run troubleshooting utilities to check control-plane connectivity 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for troubleshoot
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg 	 - CLI 
 cilium-dbg troubleshoot clustermesh 	 - Troubleshoot connectivity towards remote clusters 
 cilium-dbg troubleshoot kvstore 	 - Troubleshoot connectivity towards the etcd kvstore
